changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.product_location AS SELECT bl.id, res.name AS agency, b.name AS product, rel.name AS relationship, l.name AS location, bl.notes, up.name AS updated_by, bl.update_date FROM product_location bl JOIN agency res ON bl.agency = res.id JOIN product b ON bl.product = b.id JOIN relationship rel ON bl.relationship = rel.id JOIN location l ON bl.location = l.id JOIN agency up ON bl.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.product_location OWNER TO core;
